sources.title: "The Light on Lookout Mountain" (1924) starring Nell Shipman
sources.description: This gem is presented by Silent Hall of Fame.   Please visit https://silent-hall-of-fame.org/   to support our non-profit mission and the legacy of silent movie stars by making a tax deductible contribution.   FEEL FREE TO FOLLOW US ON TWITTER @SilentFilmGems     This is a short preview. You can watch the whole film here: https://silent-hall-of-fame.org/index.php/gems-for-donation   "The Light on Lookout Mountain" is a short drama about lumberjack country. The film is included in our program to illustrate the work of Nell Shipman, a star of Silent Hall of Fame. Directed by                 Nell Shipman and Bert Van Tuyle Produced by               Nell Shipman Productions Inc. Written by                  Nell Shipman Starring                      Nell Shipman, Dorothy Winslow, Ralph Cochner, Brownie the bear Cinematography        Robert S. Newhard Release date                coming soon Running time              16 minutes Country                        US Language                     Silent film     Copyright Disclaimer Under Section 107 of the Copyright Act 1976: "Allowance is made for "fair use" for purposes such as criticism, comment, news reporting, teaching, scholarship, and research. Fair use is a use permitted by copyright statute that might otherwise be infringing. Non-profit, educational or personal use tips the balance in favor of fair use."

metadata.Actors: Nell Shipman, Dorothy Winslow, Ralph Cochner
